creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: eight panel screen; lotus leaves with pink blossoms and foliage in pond; blue and black birds perched on or hovering around blossoms; each panel has unique image

title: Lotus Flowers and Birds
